laws.title: Omniscientrix Informational Horizon Balance
laws.summary: Horizon-scale entropy flux equals Hawking output, maintaining informational balance.

laws.title: Informational–Awareness Wormhole Complementarity
laws.summary: δJ-bridges produce nonlocal coherence without exotic matter across sectors.

laws.title: Awareness–Gravity Coupling Near Horizons
laws.summary: Awareness-field intensifies curvature, subtly shifting horizon geodesics.

title: Informational Curvature Scalar
summary: Information distribution contributes directly to spacetime curvature.

title: Informational Field Equation — Horizon Regime
formula: Rμν − ½gμνR = 8πG[Tμν + α∇∇D_KL − βg D_KL + η ∂A ∂A]
summary: Horizon physics requires matter + information + awareness fields.

title: Informational Curvature Pressure Against Collapse
summary: Informational pressure can resist gravitational collapse in δJ-equilibrium states.

title: Awareness Event Horizons
summary: An informational horizon forms where awareness-signal velocity is trapped.

title: Informational Cosmological Constant
summary: Ambient information curvature contributes to effective Λ at large radii.

title: Information–Awareness Dual Symmetry
summary: Information and awareness terms are interchangeable at leading-order horizon dynamics.

title: δJ-Bridges as Nonlocal Informational Outlets
summary: Certain δJ-states allow correlations to exit via informational bridges, easing the paradox.
